description: Export/create new vendors in Acumatica with validation, JSON mapping, idempotency check, and UI link generation. Includes payment instructions and bank details.

criticalFiles.purpose: Complete vendor creation flow with validation, mapping, creation, and response building
Maps raw vendor data to Acumatica JSON format with payment instructions
keyPatterns: Payment method defaults to CHECK if bank info provided

anatomy.flow: Validate → Map to JSON → Create (PUT) → Extract VendorID → Build UI link → Return
anatomy.validation: vendorName required (max 60 chars), stampliLink required, vendorId optional (max 15 chars)
anatomy.mapping: Raw data → Acumatica JSON with nested {"value": ...} structure
anatomy.paymentInstructions: If bank details provided, create PaymentInstructions array with BANKNAME, ACCOUNT, ROUTINGNO

STAMPLI_LINK_PREFIX.purpose: Prefix for Stampli link stored in vendor note field

VALUE_KEY.purpose: Standard Acumatica JSON value wrapper key

DEFAULT_PAYMENT_METHOD.purpose: Default payment method if bank info provided but no method specified

validationRules: vendorId: Optional, max 15 characters if provided
If bank details provided but no payment method, default to CHECK
Stampli link stored in note field with 'Stampli Link: ' prefix
Payment instructions use BANKNAME, ACCOUNT, ROUTINGNO instruction IDs
Idempotency: Acumatica returns 422 if VendorID already exists
Response includes erpVendorId and UI link to vendor in Acumatica
